price: E só permanecerá a face de teu Senhor, Possuidor de majestade e honorabilidade.
arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wayabqā wajhu rabbika dhū al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
